content: upgrade your vacation essentials with this comfortable & classic bucket hat design it s lightweight and packable making it the perfect accessory for your next sunset adventure beach exploration or summer hike with 3 sizes that you can make from itty bitty doll to child to adult this trendy modern fit hat the perfect pool companion for the whole family in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern i**n english us terms **pictures** **video tutorial** *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes kimberley - lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
